summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4116 for the improvement of the alley in Block 42, Supplementary Plat of Pontius' 2nd Addition, being the alley between Summit Avenue North and Bellevue Avenue North from East Mercer Street to East Roy Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49383, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
